## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules

### Review Process
- [ ] This PR is ready for review
- [ ] I have tagged appropriate reviewers
- [ ] All required checks have passed
- [ ] I have addressed all reviewer comments

### Deployment
- [ ] I have considered the deployment impact
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)
- [ ] Environment variables are documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Rollback plan is documented (if applicable)

### Reviewer Guidelines
1. Check code quality and adherence to standards
2. Verify functionality and user experience
3. Ensure accessibility compliance
4. Validate performance impact
5. Confirm security considerations
6. Test on multiple devices/browsers if possible
